channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 17:51 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin).
item.description: 🟠 17:51 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin). This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 17:44 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!
